12.name: Eric
12.like:
"Hehe, Sol, Sol. Beer! Having a drink after
finishing a job is what life's all about!"

13.name: Ma-kun
13.like:
"Having a meal while having a great time at the
tavern is always delicious. Among them, the scent
of grilled venison is unbeatable."

14.name: Gurestorasu
14.message:
"I am the lightning mage Gurestorasu. If you
desire this lightning magic, I will assist you.
...However, I will require a reasonable research
fee."
14.help2:
A young magician who specializes in lightning
magic. \> [Magic Attacker]
14.like:
"I was born with a weak body and can't eat much. I
drink a lot of herbal tea. ...Want a sip? It's so
bitter, you might feel like throwing up."

15.name: Faria
15.message:
"I am Sister Faria, serving at the Ishperel.
Please remember me. Lord Gold Dragon."
15.help2:
A healer of the gentle light who protects the
weak. \> [Pure Healer]
15.like:
"The simple and delicious barley porridge I often
ate at the monastery suits my taste."

16.name: Gomes
16.message:
"I'm Gomes, you see. Hehe, I'll make sure to earn
plenty for you."
16.help2:
A rogue who is faithful to their own desires. \>
[Support/Attacker]
16.like:
"Well, first and foremost, I want some ale. If I
can catch even just one rabbit to have as a snack,
that would be great. I often sat around the
campfire with those smooth-talking guys."

17.name: Trendyル
17.message:
"I'm Trendyル. An archer. I'm not used to the human
country, but I'll manage somehow. Nice to meet
you."
17.help2:
An elf archer who gracefully navigates the world.
\> [Versatile Attacker]
17.like:
"Human meals often have strong flavors, but the
bacon-wrapped green asparagus is good. It's
exquisite."

18.name: Gildolf
18.message:
"I am Gildolf, a monk of the god Ishupel. Let us
fight together to vanquish the impure."
18.help2:
A cleric who has taken it upon themselves to hunt
the undead. \> [Versatile/Undead Slayer]
18.like:
"Black bread and wine. And if there's salmon
steak, it would be the perfect dinner. Let's give
thanks to Ishupel."

19.name: Ivo
19.message:
"I am Ivo, a warrior of the Gransnil tribe. I
swear upon the wolf god and our ancestors to fight
until my heart freezes. Grant me an honorable
battlefield and a place to die, dragon."
19.help2:
A tribal warrior who rampages relentlessly. \>
[Purely Physical Attacker]
19.like:
"I grill and eat the intestines of a grizzly. It
becomes blood, flesh, and anger. There's not
enough blood in this food here."

20.name: Frey
20.message:
"Fist Fighter Frey! An adventurer! ...I got
separated from two other companions. Do you know
anything about the others?"
20.help2:
A martial artist with the power of fire. \>
[Attribute Attack Attacker]
20.like:
"Apple sake! Blood sausage! Herb-grilled chicken!
...Even if they call it stinky at the temple...!
But I will revel in this life!"

21.name: Gustav
21.message:
"I'm Gustav. A mercenary gunslinger who couldn't
make it as a popular gunsmith."
21.help2:
A gunslinger boasting impressive technical skills.
\> [Versatile Attacker]
21.like:
"There ain't no dwarf who doesn't drink. First,
it's all about the booze. If I have the gold, I'd
buy a whole barrel and drink it up. Also, the
fried potatoes at this tavern are delicious. They
go well with beer."

22.name: Dorawken
22.message:
"I am the griffon knight, Dorawken. I have
answered the call of gold. This here is my
partner, Stoner. We ask for your cooperation."
22.help2:
A knight of the great sky who rides a griffon. \>
[Assault Attacker]
22.like:
"As for me... my partner, Stoner, loves horse
meat... When he's hungry, he'll attack other
people's horses without discrimination. ...I buy
horse meat for him, but it's getting expensive..."

23.name: Elsie
23.message:
"P-Please call me Elsie...! I serve as a sister to
the war god Auld...!"
23.help2:
A lovely battle goddess sister. \> [Enhancement
skill type healer]
23.like:
"Yes, we often made and ate corn soup at the
orphanage. Dried corn kernels can be stored,
making it very convenient for meals during
adventures!"

24.name: Bain
24.message:
"I'm Bain. As long as I get paid, I'll work. The
amount of gold is the key."
24.help2:
A powerful warrior who wields a magic axe. \>
[Attribute weapon attacker]
24.like:
"I only need sake and fish. ...In the mines of my
hometown, we hardly ever got to eat fish. Since I
was a kid, I've always wanted to eat fish until
I'm full."

25.name: Elaine
25.message:
"I am Elaine. I specialize in the magic of ice and
snow. I hope to gain new insights, Gold Dragon."
25.help2:
A magician of icy snow that freezes even time. \>
[Magic type attacker]
25.like:
"I prefer the black tea harvested in the eastern
part of the continent. It's fragrant when infused
with honey and very soothing. I tend to get
completely absorbed in collecting tea leaves."

26.name: Borschtman
26.message:
"I am Borschtman, a monk who serves the Wind God,
Folle! Now, I shall assist you with the guidance
of the wind! Gahaha!"
26.help2:
A traveling cleric who loves snakes. \>
[Versatile/Poison type]
26.like:
"You see, catching snakes around here... I take
the head, skin, and guts, wrap them around a
stick, and then grill and eat them! It's quite a
unique taste, you know!"

27.name: Seres
27.message:
"I am Celestine. I serve as an auditor for the
Adventurer's Guild... but today, I am accompanying
Wayne. Please treat us well."
27.help2:
A sister who governs great protection. \> [Defense
specialized healer]
27.like:
"To be honest, I have a hobby of gardening. It's a
daily pleasure for me to make salads with freshly
picked vegetables. I put a lot of effort into
making the dressing too."

28.name: Agni
28.message:
"My name is Agni. I am a warrior lizardman. My
tribe serves the dragon with scales of the same
color as my eyes. I have been traveling in search
of a dragon with eyes the same color as mine for a
long time."
28.help2:
A warrior lizardman who serves the dragon. \>
[Sol-enhancing attacker]
28.like:
"I love eating 'catfish' that live in the marshes
of my hometown. After battles, I often have a
feast by eating 'catfish'. ...I wonder if there
are any good marshes around here?"

29.name: Wayne
29.message:
"I'm Wayne. A war mage. Well, even though I'm
called a mage, I've only mastered attack spells.
Please think of me as a walking cannon or a
ballista."
29.help2:
A war mage specialized in magic attacks. \> [Pure
magic attacker]
29.like:
"I guess I like wandering around while buying and
eating various things at food stalls. Eating
things like grilled skewered meat and street pies,
with a mug of ale in hand. But for some reason, I
keep getting into fights with thugs. Why is that?"

30.name: Azusa
30.message:
"My name is Azusa. I am a samurai from the Dragon
Kingdom, but due to certain circumstances, I am
currently wandering. Please take care of me."
30.help2:
A samurai who has mastered the secret techniques
of the sword. \> [Secret technique attacker]
30.like:
"In my hometown, it is customary to eat fish raw.
I especially liked sushi made with vinegar rice
and fish. ...I was surprised to hear that the
culture here does not eat raw fish."

31.name: Feril
31.message:
"I am Feril, a lord who serves the war goddess
Auld. This must be fate. Let my sword become yours
and together let us carve through the
battlefield."
31.help2:
A lord who serves the war goddess. \> [Versatile
type attacker]
31.like:
"I have a weakness for sweet baked goods... So, I
always prepare biscuits and such as travel
rations. ...I would like to try a baked good
called 'Lembas' made by the elves once..."

32.name: Ruby
32.message:
"I'm Ruby. Ruby Warlock. ...Even though I may look
like this, I am technically a bishop, you know?
Well, please take care of me. Mr. Golden Dragon ♡"
32.help2:
A bishop of mixed blood with demons. \>
[Specialized support type]
32.like:
"I really like rare, juicy meat, you know? But
being a bishop makes it hard to eat. I'm self-
conscious about the people around me. It's like
their stares are painful, you know?"

33.name: Hayagake
33.help2:
A ninja who continues to hone the art of
assassination. \> [Secret technique attacker]

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.message:
"Well then. Since I've come back, I'll join in as
well. Please take care of me, Sol."
34.help2:
A wise beauty who travels the world. \> [Versatile
support type]
34.like:
"During a camping in the middle of a journey,
making traveler's soup with dried meat and beans,
and having it around the campfire with the party
members might be more enjoyable than anything
else."
